Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • itutube.models.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Saveable

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements Saveable
    A user for the logged in account

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String name,
            UserType type,
            java.util.ArrayList<Media> favoritesList)
        The constructor of a user if they have a pre-determined favourites list already
        Parameters:
        name - The users name
        type - The users type. Admin, Adult or Child. Different usertypes can have different functions.
        favoritesList - The list over a users favourite media.

        type - The users type. Admin, Adult or Child. Different usertypes can have different functions.

      • getSaveString

        public java.lang.String getSaveString()
        Gets the string to save to the database over users. This includes name, usertype and their favourites.
        Specified by:
        getSaveString in interface Saveable
        Returns:
        returns a string with name, usertype and their favourites
